name: Smokey's Rescue Team
description: The game is developed for Windows PC. Players will start in an empty cat rescue home, where they will gradually receive abandoned cats. Players must ensure the cats' stats are good to maintain their well-being. If a cat's stats decline, it will interact with furniture, causing a mess. As time passes, people visit the rescue house to adopt cats, providing donations to support the operation. The game offers a great experience of simulation of cat care, interaction, and management.
